import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'connect-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/logo.svg' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({currentUser}) => { return
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN}
} const mapStateToProps = state => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
